overview:
Mr. Salinas is a co-founder of Uronimo and brings his experience as an Internet pioneer to the nascent mobile advertising market.

Previously, Mr. Salinas co-founded Interactive Creations Inc. and developed the Internet-based game â€œWarbirdsâ€ which was the first real-time massive multi-player online 3D video game which revolutionized multi-player gaming over the Internet and was featured on the cover of Computer Gaming World magazine.

During his tenure, Mr. Robert Salinas was a key member of the management team during his companyâ€™s merger with iMagic and its subsequent public offering and held positions as CEO, VP Marketing, and VP Business Development.
